resources.string: "IPv6Config could not enable address privacy on all interfaces, your privacy is NOT guaranteed at this time!"
IPv6Config could not disable address privacy on all interfaces, some may still use random addresses

Copyright (C) Ren√© Mayrhofer (2011)
IPv6Config allows to modify kernel settings to configure the Linux IPv6 stack, most notably to enable IPv6 address privacy extensions. See http://www.mayrhofer.eu.org/android-ipv6config for details.

This application is published as open source under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL) version 3. With the exception of the application icons, it may be modified and redistributed as long as the modified source code is also made available under this license.

Icons designed by Doris Mayrhofer.
